Class SearchListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.support.v4.widget.CursorAdapter
        • org.buildmlearn.appstore.adapters.SearchListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class SearchListAdapter
extends android.support.v4.widget.CursorAdapter
    An adapter class for the search list suggestions.
